name: Happy Hallows
description:
Relax on an island in the middle of an ocean while you farm away and watch the stars. There is no objective in the game yet, you just need to find your farm equipment and get farming (or swimming if you like to swim).

Controls:

Movement - ASDW

Pick-up items - E

Drop Items - Q

Jump - Space bar

Plant Crops - Left-click (mouse)

Water Crops - Left-click (mouse)

Harvest Crops - Left-click (mouse)

Pause - P or Esc

Change Window Mode - Tab 

Note: You have to drop the tool in your hand and pick up a different tool to farm, water, or harvest your crops. For the game jam I thought this was good enough (but this will hopefully change in the future).

Don't forget to collect fish from the ocean! You can't do anything with them, but it's fun just to find them and pick them up. Happy farming/exploring, hope you enjoy the game!
